item.title: Network Plus Course: Understanding the Importance of Network Logs and Logging
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Network Management" , "Network Security" , "Log Analysis" , "Network Monitoring" , "Troubleshooting" , "Network Infrastructure" , "IT Certification" , "Cybersecurity" , "Data Analysis" , "Compliance"
item.description: Explore the significance of network device logs, log reviews, and different types of logs, and learn how to interpret interface statistics and monitor interface errors.

item.title: Threat Hunting: Proactive Defense Against Cyber Attack

item.title: Maximize Windows Auditing with Windows Audit Policy Script
